Title: Forging ahead courageously while following the great leader Chairman Mao!
Designer: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: This design is presented as a collective work of the publishing house.The super-human Mao, overseeing the immeasurable crowds of his faithful supporters. Below left an ecstatic group carries a dish of mangoes, symbolizing the seven mangoes Mao received from a foreign delegation in 1968, and presented to carefully selected 'Worker-Peasant Mao Zedong Thought Propaganda Teams'.
